file_intent.text: Manage human and wheelchair model functionality

responsibilities.label: Export Human Geometry
responsibilities.description: Exports human geometry in STL or OBJ format and saves files to the local system.

responsibilities.label: Export Human Landmarks CSV
responsibilities.description: Exports human landmarks as a CSV file and saves it to the local system.

responsibilities.label: Export Human Dimensions CSV
responsibilities.description: Exports human dimensions as a CSV file and saves it to the local system.

responsibilities.label: Fit Wheelchair to Human
responsibilities.description: Fits wheelchair parameters to human parameters and updates the wheelchair parameters and GUI.

responsibilities.label: Calculate Optimal Wheelchair Parameters
responsibilities.description: Calculates optimal wheelchair parameters based on global variables and returns them.

responsibilities.label: Load Human Model
responsibilities.description: Loads the human model from a 3D model file and creates and adds the human mesh to the scene.

responsibilities.label: Load Wheelchair Model
responsibilities.description: Loads the wheelchair model and creates and adds the wheelchair mesh to the scene.

responsibilities.label: Initialize Scene
responsibilities.description: Initializes the scene and loads models, setting up the environment for rendering.

responsibilities.label: Animate Scene
responsibilities.description: Main animation loop for rendering the scene and updating models based on global state.
